happy.question: Taking all things together, how happy would you say you are? Please use this card.

sclmeet.description: How often socially meet with friends, relatives or colleagues
sclmeet.question: Using this card, how often do you meet socially with friends, relatives or work colleagues?

inprdsc.description: How many people with whom you can discuss intimate and personal matters
inprdsc.question: How many people, if any, are there with whom you can discuss intimate and personal matters?

sclact.description: Take part in social activities compared to others of same age
sclact.question: Compared to other people of your age, how often would you say you take part in social activities?

crmvct.description: Respondent or household member victim of burglary/assault last 5 years
crmvct.question: Have you or a member of your household been the victim of a burglary or assault in the last 5 years?

aesfdrk.description: Feeling of safety of walking alone in local area after dark
aesfdrk.question: How safe do you - or would you - feel walking alone in this area after dark?

health.question: How is your health in general? Would you say it is...

hlthhmp.description: Hampered in daily activities by illness/disability/infirmity/mental problem
hlthhmp.question: Are you hampered in your daily activities in any way by any longstanding illness, or disability, infirmity or mental health problem? If yes, is that a lot or to some extent?

atchctr.question: How emotionally attached do you feel to [country]? Please choose a number from 0 to 10, where 0 means not at all emotionally attached and 10 means very emotionally attached.

atcherp.question: And how emotionally attached do you feel to Europe?

rlgblg.question: Do you consider yourself as belonging to any particular religion or denomination?

values.5: Other Eastern Orthodox, denomination not specified

rlgdenl.question: Which one? (Netherlands)

rlgdegb.question: Which one? (United Kingdom)

rlgblge.description: Ever belonging to particular religion or denomination
rlgblge.question: Have you ever considered yourself as belonging to any particular religion or denomination?

rlgdnme.description: Religion or denomination belonging to in the past
rlgdnme.question: Which one? (Country)

rlgdgr.question: Regardless of whether you belong to a particular religion, how religious would you say you are?

rlgatnd.description: How often attend religious services apart from special occasions
rlgatnd.question: Apart from special occasions such as weddings and funerals, about how often do you attend religious services nowadays?

pray.description: How often pray apart from at religious services
pray.question: Apart from when you are at religious services, how often, if at all, do you pray?

dscrgrp.description: Member of a group discriminated against in this country
dscrgrp.question: Would you describe yourself as being a member of a group that is discriminated against in this country?

dscroth.question: On what grounds is your group discriminated against? Other

dscrdk.question: On what grounds is your group discriminated against? Don't know

dscrref.question: On what grounds is your group discriminated against? Refusal

dscrnap.question: On what grounds is your group discriminated against? Not applicable

values.CD: Congo, The Democratic Republic of the

livecnta.question: What year did you first come to live in [country]?

feethngr.question: Do you feel you are part of the same race or ethnic group as most people in [country]?

fbrncntc.question: In which country was your father born?

ccnthum.description: Climate change caused by natural processes, human activity, or both
ccnthum.question: Do you think that climate change is caused by natural processes, human activity, or both?

values.3: About equally by natural processes and human activity
values.55: I don't think climate change is happening

ccrdprs.description: To what extent feel personal responsibility to reduce climate change
ccrdprs.question: To what extent do you feel a personal responsibility to try to reduce climate change?

wrclmch.question: How worried are you about climate change?

testic34.description: Imagine large numbers of people limit energy use, how likely reduce climate change
testic34.question: Now imagine that large numbers of people limited their energy use. How likely do you think it is that this would reduce climate change?

testic35.description: How likely, large numbers of people limit energy use
testic35.question: How likely do you think it is that large numbers of people will actually limit their energy use to try to reduce climate change?

testic36.description: How likely, governments in enough countries take action to reduce climate change
testic36.question: And how likely do you think it is that governments in enough countries will take action that reduces climate change?

testic37.description: Imagine large numbers of people limit energy use, how likely reduce climate change
testic37.question: Now imagine that large numbers of people limited their energy use. How likely do you think it is that this would reduce climate change?

testic38.description: How likely, large numbers of people limit energy use
testic38.question: How likely do you think it is that large numbers of people will actually limit their energy use to try to reduce climate change?

testic39.description: How likely, governments in enough countries take action to reduce climate change
testic39.question: And how likely do you think it is that governments in enough countries will take action that reduces climate change?

vteurmmb.description: Would vote for [country] to remain member of European Union or leave
vteurmmb.question: Would you vote for [country] to remain a member of the European Union or to leave the European Union?

values.1: Remain member of the European Union
values.33: Would submit a blank ballot paper

vteubcmb.description: Would vote for [country] to become member of European Union or remain outside
vteubcmb.question: Would you vote for [country] to become a member of the European Union or to remain outside the European Union?

values.1: Become a member of the European Union
values.33: Would submit a blank ballot paper

testic40.description: Imagine large numbers of people limit energy use, how likely reduce climate change
testic40.question: Now imagine that large numbers of people limited their energy use. How likely do you think it is that this would reduce climate change?

testic41.question: How likely do you think it is that large numbers of people will actually limit their energy use to try to reduce climate change?

testic42.description: How likely, governments in enough countries take action to reduce climate change
testic42.question: And how likely do you think it is that governments in enough countries will take action that reduces climate change?
